Translations.Text: velevla fadlu-llahi `aleyke verahmetuhu lehemmet taifetum minhum ey yudilluk. vema yudillune illa enfusehum vema yedurruneke min sey'. veenzele-llahu `aleyke-lkitabe velhikmete ve`allemeke ma lem tekun ta`lem. vekane fadlu-llahi `aleyke `azima
la hayra fi kesirim min necvahum illa men emera bisadekatin ev ma`rufin ev islahim beyne-nnas. vemey yef`al zalike-btigae merdati-llahi fesevfe nu'tihi ecran `azima
vemey yusakiki-rrasule mim ba`di ma tebeyyene lehu-lhuda veyettebi` gayra sebili-lmu'minine nuvellihi ma tevella venuslihi cehennem. vesaet mesira
